title: Book Two: Because of Grandfather
description: Book Two: Because of Grandfather is a continuation on the lifestyle that was read about in Book One: Sporadic Memories. From the grandson’s perspective, he goes back on the lifestyle he was raised in, by giving thanks to his grandfather, who raised such an incredible man … his father. Book Two: Because of Grandfather is a novel about a lifestyle that needs to be continued.
author: Ali Marsman
